original_text: Then the angel of the Lord appeared to me, Zechariah, and he showed me Joshua, the most important priest. Joshua was standing in front of the angel of the Lord. Satan stood on the right side of Joshua. He was ready to say that Joshua had done bad things.
korean_text: 대제사장 여호수아는 여호와의 천사 앞에 섰고 사탄은 그의 오른쪽에 서서 그를 대적하는 것을 여호와께서 내게 보이시니라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord appeared to me, Zechariah
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주의 천사가 나, 스가랴에게 나타났고

sentences.original_text: and he showed me Joshua, the most important priest.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나에게 여호수아, 가장 중요한 제사장을 보여주었다.

sentences.original_text: Joshua was standing in front of the angel of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 주의 천사 앞에 서 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Satan stood on the right side of Joshua.
He was ready to say that Joshua had done bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호수아가 나쁜 일을 했다고 말할 준비가 되어 있었다.
